name: Phalcko
description:
left stick -> move

right stick -> aim

A -> sword stroke

B + left stick -> slip for evasion

X -> ability 1

RB -> ability 2

dpad to left -> heal

start/ESC -> open/close menu

Smash worms decreases countdown of abilities.

Hit enemies with basic attacks( sword ) recharge flask of the healing potion.

Is possible play only with controller, keyboard is not supported.
